name: Fearmonger
firstNightReminder: The Fearmonger chooses a player.  Declare that "the Fearmonger has chosen a player."
otherNightReminder: The Fearmonger chooses a player.  If the player wasn't already marked with the FEAR reminder, declare that "the Fearmonger has chosen a player."
ability: Each night, choose a player: if you nominate & execute them, their team loses. All players know if you choose a new player.
flavor: "Beware of gazing long into the Abyss, lest the Abyss also gaze into you."

jinxes.reason: If the Storyteller would gain the Fearmonger ability, a Minion gains it, and learns this.
The Vizier wakes with the Fearmonger, learns who they choose and cannot choose to immediately execute that player.
